title: Collection Batch Update Format

oic.batch-update.item.description: array of resource representations to apply to the batch collection, using href to indicate which resource(s) in the batch to update. If the href property is empty, effectively making the URI reference to the collection itself, the representation is to be applied to all resources in the batch

href.description: URI of the target resource relative assuming the collection URI as anchor

oneOf.description: The response payload from a single resource
The response payload from a collection (batch) resource

oic.wk.col-batch-update.description: array of resource representations to apply to the batch collection, using href to indicate which resource(s) in the batch to update. If the href property is empty, effectively making the URI reference to the collection itself, the representation is to be applied to all resources in the batch
